title: html/template: Funcs refers to template.FuncMap (in text/template)
body:
It's confusing for html/template to refer to text/template types
in its documentation.  Maybe it should define its own FuncMap type.

I tried to write template.FuncMap{ ... }
and was very confused as to why the compiler
said that didn't exist, when it was right there in the docs:


func (t *Template) Funcs(funcMap template.FuncMap) *Template
